notes_text: Cannabis was banned in Suriname in the early 20th century, having been popularized there by Asian immigrants.
notes: Cannabis was banned in Suriname in the early 20th century, having been popularized there by Asian immigrants.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Suriname}} Cannabis was banned in Suriname in the early 20th century, having been popularized there by Asian immigrants.<ref name="Hoefte1998">{{cite book|author=Rosemarijn Hoefte|title=In Place of Slavery: A Social History of British Indian and Javanese Laborers in Suriname|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=EPzT5AYLvL0C&pg=PA160|year=1998|publisher=University Press of Florida|isbn=978-0-8130-1625-2|pages=160â€“}}</ref>
